tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE voting_history ( 
    voter_id INT NOT NULL, 
    decision_id INT NOT NULL, 
    vote VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL, 
    vote_timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL, 
    PRIMARY KEY (voter_id, decision_id) 
);

CREATE TABLE governance_members ( 
    member_id INT NOT NULL, 
    member_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, 
    role VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, 
    join_date DATE NOT NULL, 
    PRIMARY KEY (member_id) 
);

CREATE TABLE GovernanceMembers (
    member_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    member_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    position VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    start_date DATE NOT NULL,
    end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE VotingDecisions (
    decision_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    decision VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    outcome VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    vote_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    voter_id INT NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (voter_id) REFERENCES VotingHistory(voter_id)
);

CREATE TABLE voting_history (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    member_id INT,
    decision VARCHAR(255),
    vote_time TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE governance_members (
    member_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    member_name VARCHAR(255),
    join_date DATE,
    total_votes INT
)

CREATE TABLE decisions (
    decision_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    decision_name VARCHAR(255),
    decision_description TEXT,
    decision_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE votes (
    vote_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    decision_id INT,
    member_id INT,
    vote_choice VARCHAR(10)
)

CREATE TABLE member_votes (
    vote_id INT,
    member_id INT,
    decision_id INT,
    vote_choice VARCHAR(10),
    FOREIGN KEY (vote_id) REFERENCES vote_history(vote_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (member_id) REFERENCES governance_members(member_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (decision_id) REFERENCES decisions(decision_id)
);
